name: Time To Tan (Prototype)
description:
This is a project made for the UCSB Game Dev Club winter game jam. The theme of the jam was "getaway": so in our game, you go on a relaxing vacation in the sun, trying to get the perfect tan. Originally we wanted moving shadows to impede the goal of getting the perfect bronze, like seagulls flying overhead and drifting clouds. For now, it's a prototype with the basic mechanics and art.

Controls:

- left click to move

- space to lay down

- left shift to flip over
